candidates.reason: Swarm Consensus (7 votes): groq: As a Bitcoin mining stock, RIOT follows crypto cycles and exhibits high volatility, similar to MARA. Swarm Consensus (3 votes): xai: CLSK (CleanSpark) focuses on sustainable Bitcoin mining, similar to WULF and MARA, with boom/bust cycles driven by crypto market trends and energy costs. High volatility from operational expansions and halvings, plus commodity exposure via electricity dependencies. Recent weakness (down ~30% in Q3 2024 amid broader crypto pullback) suggests mean reversion potential as mining efficiency improves and Bitcoin stabilizes above $60K. Aligns with goldmine crypto volatility and cycles; sector rotation opportunity as clean energy narrative rotates back in.; claude_haiku: Bitcoin mining stock with direct crypto cycle exposure. Follows MARA/WULF patterns with high volatility, boom/bust cycles tied to BTC price action. Recent weakness from $20+ highs creates mean reversion setup. Retail interest in mining narrative.

Swarm Consensus (2 votes): xai: ROKU (Roku) has meme stock vibes like NOK in the streaming/telecom space, with high retail interest and volatility from ad revenue cycles and competition. Boom/bust patterns tied to consumer tech trends and economic sensitivity. Down ~40% in 2024 from slowing user growth and macro headwinds, ripe for mean reversion on holiday streaming surges or partnerships. Fits goldmine high retail interest and sharp reversals; sector rotation into tech/discretionary during ad recovery.; ollama_gpt: Roku’s streaming platform is subject to cyclical advertising demand and retail hype. The share price has pulled back from a recent high, and its volatility profile makes it a candidate for mean‑reversion as ad‑revenue cycles normalize. Sector rotation into media/entertainment adds upside.
